code:
sequenceDiagram participant A as Computadora A
(Logistics_TrackingNumber) participant S as Switch
(Logistics_StockLevel) participant B as Computadora B
(Logistics_FleetManagement) participant C as Computadora C
(Logistics_Warehouse) participant D as Computadora D
(Logistics_TrackingNumber) Note over S: Tabla MAC vacía Note over A,D: FASE 1: ARP Request (Logistics_DeliveryRoute) A->>S: ARP Request
Origen: A (Logistics_Warehouse)
Destino: Broadcast (Logistics_DeliveryRoute) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 1 → MAC de A S->>B: ARP Request (Logistics_FleetManagement) S->>C: ARP Request (Logistics_Warehouse) S->>D: ARP Request (Logistics_DeliveryRoute) Note over B,D: Solo C responde al ARP Note over A,D: FASE 2: ARP Response C->>S: ARP Response
Origen: C (Logistics_TrackingNumber)
Destino: A (Logistics_FleetManagement) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 3 → MAC de C S->>A: ARP Response (Logistics_TrackingNumber) Note over A,D: FASE 3: Comunicación Directa A->>S: Datos para C
Origen: A (Logistics_TrackingNumber)
Destino: C (Logistics_StockLevel) Note over S: Consulta tabla MAC
Encuentra C en puerto 3 S->>C: Datos (Logistics_StockLevel)
